Title: A Good Man Goes to War (1)
Plot:
Amy Pond has been kidnapped and the Doctor is raising an army to rescue her as the drama continues. But as he and Rory race across galaxies, calling in long-held debts and solemnly given promises, his enemies are laying a carefully concealed trap.

In her cell in Stormcage, River Song sadly acknowledges that the time has come at last ? today will mark the Battle of Demons Run and the Doctor?s darkest hour. Both sides will make their sacrifices and River Song must finally reveal her most closely
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Alex Kingston, Frances Barber, Christina Chong, Simon Fisher-Becker, Catrin Stewart, Neve McIntosh, Danny Sapani, Jimmy Vee, Nicholas Briggs, Dan Starkey, Charlie Baker, Dan Johnston
